146
Feby 22d 5
Capt J R Aubrey
Elizabethtown Ky.
Captain

Your letter of the 14th inst to his Excellency Governor Bramlette, has been referred to this Office: Having issued authority to several persons already to raise battalions in your immediate section of the state, it is not deemed advisable to issue more at present.

Very Respectfully
D W, Lindsey
Inspt & Adj Genl Ky
